title: nova volume-attach failed with error info libvirtError: internal error unable to execute QEMU command '__com.redhat_drive_add': Device 'drive-virtio-disk3' could not be initialized

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~xiaoguo

comments.content: I can reproduce this bug with nova+cinder+sheepdog.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ljjjustin

comments.content: This is a configuration issue - qemu needs to have support for ceph or sheepdog compiled in.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jdurgin
